attributes.action: Ask all Mp's who have Overclaimed expenses to voluntarily donate equivalent sums to a fund which can then be given to charity!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Maybe the Mp's would be seen in a better light if they volutarily gave money equivalent to the overclaimed expenses to really worthy causes. I would imagine that the shortfall of 6 million for christies hospital could be recouped from the sums that have been mentioned in the media.

Obviously an indpendant trust of ordinary voters could be setup to oversee the distribution of the fund fairly.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
